title: https://www.curry.edu/assets/Images/Homepage/About/Leadership/PLP-490.png
description: Leadership programs at Curry college: The President’s Leadership Program (PLP) at Curry College is made up of a highly selective group of talented, driven, compassionate, and accomplished students and is designed to inspire and foster leaders of tomorrow. The President’s Leadership Program prepares students for a life of leadership, civic responsibility, and career success through a range of activities, workshops, and events just for PLP students both inside and outside the classroom.

title: https://www.curry.edu/assets/Images/Homepage/Academics/Academic-Resources/SAIL-1903.png
description: Social Achievement in Learning (SAIL) Program at Curry College: The Social Achievement in Learning (SAIL) program is designed for academically capable students with neurodiverse profiles who benefit from individualized support to reach their full potential in a college environment.

title: https://www.curry.edu/assets/Images/Homepage/Academics/PAL/PAL-Academics-24-720.png
description: PAL Academic Experience: PAL provides personalized academic support tailored to your needs, offering either one-on-one or small group sessions.

title: https://www.curry.edu/assets/Images/Homepage/Academics/Partnerships/connector-490B.png
description: Curry Connectors: Curry Connectors are our partners who are seeking to develop a diverse workforce pipeline and who are also interested in supporting and participating in industry-relevant academic programming such as mentorships, class visits, class consulting projects, networking events, or career fairs.

title: https://www.curry.edu/assets/Images/Homepage/Admission-Aid/Admission/OH-307.jpg
description: Curry College is a private liberal arts college in Milton, Massachusetts, offering a supportive and dynamic learning environment that fosters academic, personal, and professional growth for students.
